courses.title: Sleep Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the basics of healthy sleep and understand the science behind better rest.

lessons.title: Introduction to Sleep Science
lessons.description: Learn about sleep cycles, REM sleep, and why quality sleep matters for your health.

lessons.title: Understanding Your Circadian Rhythm
lessons.description: Discover how your body's internal clock affects your sleep patterns.

lessons.title: Common Sleep Disorders
lessons.description: Identify and understand common sleep problems and when to seek help.

courses.title: Sleep Optimization
courses.description: Advanced techniques to dramatically improve your sleep quality.

lessons.title: Creating the Perfect Sleep Environment
lessons.description: Optimize your bedroom for maximum sleep quality with temperature, lighting, and sound control.

lessons.title: Evening Routine Mastery
lessons.description: Build a powerful wind-down routine that signals your body it's time to sleep.
